name: Reformed
description:
It always need some changes to fit in. Same is all about our game. Reformed is a hyper-casual game in which a flexible object is sliding on the path. The obstacles comes in different shapes, and user need to reshape the object to keep it running.

There are gems to collect which contributes to your high score, and the basic score calculation is based on the distance covered.

Features of game includes: - Simple control based game. - No complications, easy to start and play. - Challenging to ensure it keeps you engaged. - Customization to game layout available for purchase using Gems that you collect. No money involved. - Ads to support development. (One advertisement after every 3 games) - Fun to play.

The game is easy to play for everyone. It is a simple game and it helps increasing the response time for the gamer.

We are planning to bring future versions of the game which might include multiplayer game play and Facebook linked leader board.

The game provides you with lots of fun and you can play it in between your friends and compete to show your reflexes.

We hope you will enjoy the game. Please drop a review and let us know your thoughts about the game.

Buckle Up!
